snippet.title: Reknum - Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Reknum is a video game designed for PS4 and Nintendo Switch consoles. In Reknum you play like the princess Cheri, who must advance through 6 different completely explorable zones, loot chests with crystals that will increase her passive skills in order to advance. The game has the characteristic of autosalvado starting, so you can move at your own pace and devote to explore each area thoroughly.

Each zone introduces different elements which must be evaluated to be able to advance, to examine how to advance, to examine the behavior of the enemies, to fight bosses in the pure style of the NES will be your day to day in the game.

The game has elements that make it very characteristic. 8bit characters, backgrounds and 16bit bosses, modern effects to give life. The musical section is also special, the music composed by Ines Mirás gives a twist to the gameplay since it has a base structure in 8bit with modern music and instrumental arrangements.

The story introduces us to the princess Cheri, which must make its way through 6 different areas of the kingdom in order to reach the castle where the evil sorceress is. The sorceress has locked the entire kingdom within 5 crystals to absorb their vital energy and be immortal, your mission will be to break the crystals and kill the evil sorceress in order to restore peace to the kingdom.

#nindies #NintendoSwitch #indie
